low.name: Comprehensive Health Insurance
low.description: A full-coverage health plan with low premiums and wide coverage for medical expenses.
low.coverage_details: Covers hospitalization, OPD visits, and diagnostic tests.

low.name: Family Health Insurance Plan
low.description: A policy that covers your entire family with discounted premiums.
low.coverage_details: Covers self, spouse, children, and dependent parents.

medium.name: Standard Health Insurance
medium.description: A balanced health insurance policy with moderate premiums and good coverage.
medium.coverage_details: Covers hospitalization, selected OPD treatments, and emergency medical care.

medium.name: Critical Illness Insurance
medium.description: A policy providing financial support for serious medical conditions such as cancer and heart disease.
medium.coverage_details: Provides a lump sum payout upon diagnosis of major illnesses.

high.name: High-Risk Health Coverage
high.description: Specialized insurance for individuals with pre-existing conditions or high-risk health factors.
high.coverage_details: Covers hospitalization, emergency care, and specialist visits.

high.name: Accident & Disability Insurance
high.description: Provides financial security in case of accidents or permanent disability.
high.coverage_details: Covers disability, loss of income, and hospitalization due to accidents.

high.name: Senior Citizen Health Plan
high.description: A plan designed for individuals with age-related health risks and chronic conditions.
high.coverage_details: Covers regular health checkups, hospitalization, and prescription medicines.
